review: this game is a classic but the steam version has issues  fortunately i did not buy this as it was a free addon from supporting the early access for max damage  i recommend you instead spend your money on the gog version which is easier to stabalise  this is unfortunate as i really wanted to like this version for the trading cards but unfortunately its too much of a headache having to reset my custom settings every other time i launch the game
make sure you save up at least 9 million credits before you take on the trucking hell mission  thank me later

1010  carmageddon 2 is a classic your objective is to run all laps kill all other racers or splatter all pedestrians with tons of cars to unlock and a soundtrack featuring iron maiden this game is a great vehicle combat experience if you like old games cars or gore youll have a good time this was the first game i ever played on a pc and i have fond memories playing it with my father

bcarmageddon 2 carpocalypse nowb is a thrilling and chaotic game and one of my old time favourites with its intense car combat crazy powerups and endless mayhem this game offers a unique and exhilarating experience i highly recommend it to anyone looking for a wild and entertaining ride that will keep you on the edge of your seat
